ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] My day in Kaesora was  Re: MM Drum misadventure and Nostrolo Tamborine
ygData.msgSnippet: I m gonna have to go with it being easy, because I now have 5 extra kaesora coins. I ve been going there the last 3 or 4 nights now. We typically start up top,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm gonna have to go with it being easy, because I now have 5 extra kaesora
coins.

I've been going there the last 3 or 4 nights now. We typically start up top,
drop down, hit the reaver room, crawl to the library, take 2 spawns, then
crawl to the church and camp there. We've seen the raider every single time
we've been there.

Last week, we camped the library for tomes. In one night we saw 3 raiders.
They seem to be on at least twice the normal spawn for the dungeon. Spawn on
the dungeon is about 15-20 min. So if you have a raider spawn when you get
there, expect to wait 30-40 min for the next one. I'm also guessing there
could be phs so that would mean if you got a ph, it would be 60-80 min in
between.

Anyways, he's there a lot. If you want the coin, I suggest bringing a group
and holding the library for 2 hours, I'd virtually guarantee you leave with
a coin.

Drae
